name: Papel
description:
A game made in 48 hours for the Volcano Game Jam 2020

made with Unity

History : 

Follow the journey of a group of sea turtles that during a walk get surprised by an eruption, an island is appearing under their feet ! In this world made entirely of paper, the turtles will have to make their way through a constantly changing 
island by solving puzzles. Their journey will end in a wildlife centre on the island that has settled down over time, a place where they will be safe.

Teammate :
